Description:
The FHIR Endpoint resource describes the technical details of a location that can be connected for the delivery or retrieval of information. The resource contains information on how to connect and for what purposes. This endpoint does not need to be the current system, it can describe locally hosted services, regional services, or national services.

Talk to the target organization for their supported protocols when using this resource.
SampleResponse:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

<Endpoint xmlns="http://hl7.org/fhir">

<id value="ehNSAQVtoxEih.WlA-M0vLnO86lyeQd5rX8BdjRileRk3" />

<status value="active" />

<connectionType>

<system value="http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/endpoint-connection-type" />

<code value="direct-project" />

<display value="Direct Project" />

</connectionType>

<name value="Holiday, Doc" />

<payloadType>

<coding>

<system value="http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/endpoint-payload-type" />

<code value="urn:hl7-org:sdwg:ccda-structuredBody:1.1" />

</coding>

<text value="Documents following C-CDA constraints using a structured body." />

</payloadType>

<payloadType>

<coding>

<system value="http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/endpoint-payload-type" />

<code value="urn:hl7-org:sdwg:ccda-nonXMLBody:1.1" />

</coding>

<text value="Documents following C-CDA constraints using a non structured body." />

</payloadType>

<payloadMimeType value="text/xml" />

<payloadMimeType value="text/plain" />

<payloadMimeType value="application/pdf" />

<address value="dhol@directaddress.net" />

</Endpoint>

address.Name: address
address.Description: The provider address. This is a direct address, not a general address.

name.Name: name
name.Description: A name by which you can identify this endpoint.
